description: {"blocks":[{"key":"due4n","text":"This protocol is used to visualize for dopaminergic neurons in Drosophila brains, but can be adapted for other targets as well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"1j3et","text":"Rabbit polyclonal anti-TH, Millipore,  Cat# AB152, RRID: AB_390204","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cl6na","text":"Mouse monoclonal anti-DLG, DSHB, DSHB Cat# 4F3 anti-discs large; RRID: AB_528203","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"29ko1","text":"Goat anti-Rabbit IgG Alexa Fluor‱ 488, Life Technologies, Cat# A-11034 RRID: AB_2576217","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":32,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6la25","text":"Goat anti-Mouse IgG Alexa Fluor‱ 555, Life Technologies, Cat# A-21424 RRID: AB_141780","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8pk29","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1uta5","text":"RapiClear 1.47, Sunjin Lab, Cat# RC147001","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"69udh","text":"Triton X-100 Solution, Sigma Aldrich, Cat# 93443-100ML","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2hcns","text":"Formaldehyde solution (37 wt. % in H2O) F1635-500ml, Sigma-Aldrich","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"6C6D1739445911EF829A0A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}},"1":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"7A8B24B9445911EFA8820A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.section: Dissection of fly brains, fixation, block and primary antibody incubation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"97lt7","text":"Prepare fresh 3.7% paraformaldehyde in 1x PBS, 0.2% Triton X-100 (PBX),   per genotype and store  . {"blocks":[{"key":"2jtda","text":"Add secondary antibody (in   of 10% NGS in PBX), cover with tinfoil and put it on rotation wheel at    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":102,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":27,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":100,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":102,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","duration":172800,"error":false,"guid":"6BEBC0CB445011EF8FAC0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","duration":172800,"error":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"6BEBC182445011EF8FAC0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":172800,"guid":"6BEBC03B445011EF8FAC0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1cf6o","text":"Take the secondary antibody solution off and wash a first time with PBX 0.2% ( ) and take\nit off right away","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":78,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"7C2EAC40445711EFA8820A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e73js","text":"Wash 3 times with PBX 0.2% ( ) for 15 min on a rotator at  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":28,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"4BC0A793445011EF8FAC0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"3D77A8C5445011EF8FAC0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3ht8q","text":"prepare slides: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dpapm","text":"clean slides with EtOH","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3tlm","text":"place 2 book binder rings on top of each other","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"48vcs","text":"fill book binder rings with 0.075% PLL solution, leave minimum  , take the solution off and leave a thin layer to dry","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":63,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5m12h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4vlpc","text":"Mount fly brains by pipetting the brains next to the book binders, fill the book binder chamber with PBX and transfer the brains individually with forceps to the book binder chamber, orient the brains correctly with anterior facing up (antenna lobe up) and softly push down until they stick","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cbrpe","text":"remove PBX","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1okdq","text":"add 8 μl of mounting medium (RapiClear 1.47) by gently pipetting on top of brains  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"47r1j","text":"add glass coverslip, seal with nail polish and let cure overnight at   in dark","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":69,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"09646989445911EF829A0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

steps.section: Dissection of fly brains, fixation, block and primary antibody incubation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3t7j","text":"Use rabbit a-TH, Sigma, 1:200, and mouse a-DLG, DSHB, 1:100","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d48jb","text":"Use Goat anti-Rabbit IgG Alexa Fluor‱ 488, Life Technologies, and Goat anti-Mouse IgG Alexa Fluor‱ 555, Life Technologies, at 1:500 dilution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":97,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"6C6D1739445911EF829A0A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}},"1":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"7A8B24B9445911EFA8820A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}}}}
